entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload isn't working - aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js isn't being injected into the page #41732
    Discussions
  • Issue when binding DateTime to input type="time" #41731
    6.0.x
  • Add option to control whether controller names are trimmed or not when used for routing #41730
  • Component Governance alerts of eventsource for signalr package in npm #41729
  • Asp.net core source code gives compile time errors in Visual studio #41727
  • Add generic method overloads to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results static class #41724

Closed

  • ModelState validation changes when adding a new property to an existing model #41687
  • Undocumented breaking changes .NET 5 => .NET 6 #41679
  • Filters that don't have any parameters shouldn't allocate an empty array #41705
    7.0-preview5
  • Support for dotnet-watch to reload when server listening log is on a single line missing from 5.0.4xx #39610
    5.0.x
  • npm project @microsoft/signalr depend on security vulnerable version of eventsource #41728
  • Blazor bindings broken by cascading value #41700
  • System.IO.DirectoryInfo doesn't work properly in client-side Blazor WebAssembly #41706

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    community-contribution
  • release/6.0 Quarantine all but pri 0 shadow copy test #41738
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add IServerDelegationFeature to DI #41737
    area-runtime
  • Allow explicit manual runs of mirror pipeline #41736
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Quarantine a couple IIS tests #41741
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Use Array.Empty for parameterless filters #41740
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #41735
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Move RateLimiting projects in their own folder #41734
    7.0-preview5
  • Add installer artifacts to source build intermediate #41733
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Add AppOfflineDroppedWhileSiteIsDown_SiteReturns503_InProcess to test retry list #41718
    7.0-preview5
  • Add script to mirror one internal branch to another #41715
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fall back to using old command when GetServer isn't supported #41649
    area-runtime
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • Update Trimming.md #41720
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
